column2: Sa' Yee Kitu Ke Nsay Yee Kum Ghay Wir Msong
Mo ki dzeen ki kiiyin ji viwir ve vir msong vi dze a fomo Nyuy wun a ji ghay nggang see kfee wir msong si dze kinseng ke vitaavi, suuyru wun a nyaang e kitu ke nsay,

Mo ta’nteng wun a nyaang fo ghay wir msonge ku dinen ne laayee a dze wo lii nyam se kwa’ wo wu bivirin vifii ve wiri wun a wong wo wiri ki ker fo a yu vijung ve kisungnin kee nggengger wun a Biimee, a`fo a dze la fan wun a fo kitan ki siin ki kiiyin ji dze a shii wo tavin wo wir dzem,
Mo ki dzeen e shii ji nser king a ghay wir msong fo wiri shwiiy kilong e wiy e rer si bi’ fo bo a yo’ dzee ker dzee yimo’ foo se vitu vev fo sa’ vitaavii wun a ne’si,
Mo ki dzeen e shii foo yii e vitum vi waa kongnen,

Mo wir vee Kintati ke vitum vee kitu ke nsayi ferin ne nser foo see biime yev e kum kinseng ke ghay wir nsong, foo din viwir wun a viku’uy ve wir, a virengreng ve lumen w`n wiiy, e kfen way wayin ji kikuuyi ke wong wun a Dze’em ye junge dze e mve vitaavi ve du’un vi,
Mo vitum ve dzeen nggang se Kintati ke vitum vee kitu ke nsay vi ka`an ne fo awunee vitu ji a wiy suusin wo’, e so fo wir dzem waa ker ghvem e kfen a lem nser see kum ghay wun a vitaavi ve wiri.
Mo wir dze`m kiiy ghay sin wun a vitaavi vin vi, ki dze e shii fo ngka’me ven waa dze eyiin,
Mo ki dzeen ben,
Dze’em Ye Ku’une
Nen fung

Sa’yee Kitu Ke Nsay Yee Kum Ghay Wir Msong Ren, ji mfi’ njiin yee reng fo wiri wun a vitum vi vidzem, e du e may jiwir wo’on mo’on wun a Vintati vee wong vi, mo a lem s’’a’ren ghan sidzem e vifii, a wiy a mum e mvem ye’ey wun a dungrii fo a tavir ghvem ghay sin wun a vitaavi vin vi, shishar shishar, e mvem wong wun akitu ke nsay fo yii, aa kiiy e kfen a lem kijuujung e mvem wir vee vitum ve dzeeng nggang si wun a wir vee vitum ve awune sar sa’ren vi.
A dzee wir dzem rengreng fo ghvem wun a fo ghay, a yo’ dzee wir msong ji kwan. Wir dzem km k fomo woo fo kwa’ti wun a fo vifii, a wu ker fo a yii e wumo’ woo wir moo fer ve.

Wir dem ker ghay wun a vitaavi vi vidzem mo sa’ rene suuyin la nya’ kin kum ram, nshom, kin lumen kin Wiiy, kin lam, biime yee kum Nyuy, dzee sa’, kwa’ti simo’si, kitum wun a ngke’ se dze’em si, keng, kidzeey kin anta’ amo’o.
Wir dzem ker vitaavi fo a dze e tin, foo yii mo wu ta’ a yii e kfen a dze e kingen.
Wir yo’ ker fo a lim vikwan, kin a lim lim yee la vikaane. Vikwan wun a mfiine wir msong, kin dze e dzee rene yo’ ker fo a dze.
A yo’ ker fo a nyavri e wir a yii kfee kinyo ke ki waa kin moo ji wir yo’ dze a wir bey.
Fo nser si, wir dzem ker ghay vire’ vidzem fo a yensin ji wir.

Wir dzem dze rengreng e sar nser. A nser ker fo a shiy wun rengreng la nya’. Nser ker fo a king wir dzem rengreng la nya’ e ghan se kinya’ ki neen ne e nen bve’ sa’ wir msong ren. La wir yo’ a bayir wiri ji a waa leey amo’o nteng.
Wir dzem ker ghay ji nser yee wong nee e wun kinyo, e tar kijung e ghan se wir /wiri bve’en nser ye wonge foon kin ye yi dzeen e ngwa’ nser woo wong, ji yi waa shiy wun/awune.
La wir yo’wiy koo wir e fin e lav, e ne’si kin e jum fo wong, a bo nser yee wong yo’ biime.

Wir dzem ker ghay rengreng fo a sa’ nsa’re la kilo’, a wu ker ghay ji a sa’ a nsa’ re e lav nsa’ yee nggengger ye yi tiy fo wun kitu, kfen sa’nsa’ rengreng mo yi dzeen la kilo’ foo din vitaavi ve wu keri wun a vinyo ve wu ker foo yii vi wun a nsa’ yee kum wun.

Wir dzem wo a toyin wun e kinyo ker ghay fo kwa’tii waa dze ji wu dze a la jay, e mee e ghan se wu tiim e nggengger e kiba’ ke nsa’ aa sa’ wun rengreng mo nser dzeen, e boo yen jay ve bi’ fo dzeen fen fo dze dzee si feesin foo se wun.

Bo yo’dze a koo wir ji bi’ fo wu bu’un kinyo, kin dze kinyo kee la ndzen ke a gov wir sho, e sar nser wong kin yee kitu ke nsay e ghan se kinyo kee shooy ki kooyin, a bo yo’ dze a fo ngge’ la’ ye yi shaa kinyo ke ngwerin ki bu’un e ghan se kinyo ki ki kooyin.
A yo’ ker foo nee e wir kiliti ke dze’e’m, kfee’, la’, ntum si kin fo a ron ghvem re, kin yir re, a bo yo’dze mo nser ta’a. Wir dzem ker ghay fo nser king wun fo vinyo fen.
Wir dzem ker ghay fo a ghan a shiiy aawunee mvem wong mo wu konge.
wir dzem ker ghay foo fee fo wong wumo’o kin fo vee, e kfen a ker vitaavi foo kfen e bam e wun wong.
Wir dzem ker ghay wo dze wu waa ta’ e kfen a yu vijung ve kibeey fo kinjuyri wir kin dze e kitum kine ki.
Kibeey kin ki yo’dze ki waa dze fo wir vee mo a nyeng fo nsa’ se bo si yo’ kum dzee sa’ yee wong wun a vinyo ve bo vi yo’ tom ashii wun a nser se vintati vee kitu ke nsay.
wir dzem ker ghay e wun wong fo a dze wan Nsay.
Bo nser yo’biime ji a sha’nin a wir fo wun ghay moo wan nsay kin foo sha’nin ghay ve fo wu kuvsin kitum kfe (wong ve’)

Vilum wun a Vikiy ve a kuyin ne la biiy kum ram, wong wun a biimee, a ker ghay fo a ker tati vijin, a fer kfee. Awune ker vitaavi rengrng e ghan se tati vijin, e mvem dze’em tati vijin wun a ghan se javsin.
Tati vijine ku dze ca’ a dze ca’ a dze fo Wiiy wun Lumen ve a biimen fo awune vitu ji dze a waa dze.
Kfee dze fomo Nyuy, a kfen dze kintati ke nggwarin wong, a kitum wun a wonge ker fo a king.
Wir dzem ker vitaavi fo a ker vifa ve fo wun kitu rengreng mo dze wu waa ker e kintati wun a wir amo’o.
Nser yo’biime ji wir wumo’ kinen a wir wumo’ fo wun keng.

Wir dzem ker ghay fo a ker kwa’ti re, vifii ve wun a biime ree. Ghay rene tati vitaavi vee foo kuvsin dzee biime Nyuy, fo wun kitu kin e Kintati wun a wir amo’o wun a e nggengger kin kintati foo din biime re moo e dungri, e yii, e ghvem wun a foo lem nser.

Wir dzem ker ghay foo shu kinyo wun a foo suuy kwa’ti re; ghay rene fo vitaavi fo wir waa tiy e wun nshu la kinjivir wun a foo ta’, e seesi, e kfen samer sa’ka wun a kwa’ti si e dzee see mo sa’ka yii ghanen sho e kitu ke nsay la biiy.
Wir dzem ker ghay foo tarnin wun a wiri e kfen tati kintati ke dze’em yee nyaang.
La wir yo’ kan wir ji wu tati a kintati ke bo yo’ dzeen kong re.
Wir dzem ker ghay foo a dze e mvem sa’yee wun wong, fo wun kitu kin foo sho’ wiri aa li kire’ kfe.
Wir dzem ker ghay rengreng foo li kinyo kfe e du sho e vire’ ve lim vee wun wong aa ka’ay.

Tim sa’ yee wonge wiy a dze, a dze mo wiri konge. Kong rene wiy a din wun e dzee ye a wiy a sho’ti wiri sho e ghan si ghan si la kilo’, a sho’ ti rene wiy a yii wir dzem wo wu kuyin ne wun a virengreng vi, aa wiy a sho’ e kiliti kin e dzee yee reng yimo’ ye yi shwinen ren.

Wir dzem, moo wir woo wong ker ghay lo a dze e kingen, e klen a yen ji wonge wun a vitum vimo’ vi suusin a wo, a king wun rengreng mo kav kin kenge dzee`n e wong si wong si, e kum ghay dzee keng, dze’em wun a lii wong wov ve dzeen ku fo wun viwir wun, wun a ghveme.
Wir dzem ker ghay fo a ker lim. Foo sho’ kfee lim ye wu konge, e laa yo’ a bo’ wun, e wu waa lim lim a yu vijung wun a ji wu waa dze e kingen fo kibung ke lim.
Wir dzem wo wu lim lim rengreng ker fo a ker vila’ay rengreng la nya’.

Wir dzem wo wu lim lim ker ghay fo a ker vilaame vee reng ve vi gheenen wun ve dze vi tom wun wun a kfee ree ji a dze yi waa ker viwir ve wir msong, wun a ntom simo’ si, a shii fen dze se si waa kin dze’em re.
Wir dzem ker ghay foo ke’ kin foo tati vintati ve vi king lim re vee wun kong.
Wir dzem ker ghay foo meeme fo shuu lim a yii kifa ke wu konge, e tati wun a ghan se lim se si waa dze si gheenen wun a vishiiy ve bam vi, a meeme yee ke’ fo nggam ye yi waa ker vilaame.

Wir dzem ker ghay foo a ker dze’em ye yi waa dze e gheenen foo yii e wun wun waa dze e tavin wun a kfee ree, moo fo viyikir, ndzey, lav wun a shiv si, a vinyo vee shii ve vi waa se wun, e kfen a ker ghay fo a waa leey fo wun e ghan se kibung ke lim, se yasi, se ndzem, se vingkfe, se vidzeene kin kigha’ woo dze’em wo wu shaane vitaavi ve.
Yiy wun wan ker ghay fo a ker leey wun ase yee jeeyi. Won adzem ve a dzeen kin e mvem tati vijin kin e visakii ker ghay rengreng fo a dze a kingen e dze’em.

Wir dzem ker ghay foo ye’ey ngwa’. Ye’ey rene ker fo a dze kisang, a ki fem gha’e le, e ngke’se a dzee yiy ye’ey sho yiyin. NGke’ ye’ey ye yiyin ren ker fo a dze ku fo wir dzem. Ye’ey fer wun a ye lime ker fo a dze teeter fo wir dzem. Ye’ey se tavkin si se si shaan sin si wiy a dze fo wir dzem rengreng mo vifii ve vi dzeen.

Shii ngwa’wo ye’eyine ker fo a dze foo yii e wir kiiy wun a foo tavir ghvem yee kum ghay wun a vitaavi ve wir msong vi. Yi ker foo kuyir yunin, a li vinyo foter, a kuyir vingkar e vitum vidzem vi mvem, e mvem kfee se wir msong kin vitati ve dzee biime Nyuy, e kden a tavir lim se kintati ke vitum vee kitu ke nsay fo a lem nyaang.
Atar wun aayiyi ker ghay foo sho’ kfee ye’ey ye dze a waa fo e won vevi.
Wir dzem ker ghay fo a tati la kan e vinyo ve lii woo wun wong, e kfen a yu vijung ve fer, a ker kiling fo kikuuyi ke vinyo ve a tarin ne kijung wun a se’ ve.
Wir dzem ker ghay fo dze e kingen fo yir wun a fo se’ wo wu loon fo wun fer kin dze ye tar vinyo, sang wun a ye fer kiwoo.
Wir dzem ker ghay fo a ker nyaang e wun wong wun a kitu ke nsay, e fi’ a ker ghay wun a vitaavi ve vi mo sa’ rene suuyin.
Wir dzem ker fo a lim, a dze e wun kiling bi’fo dzeen fo ca’ca’ fo dze wu kuyir kitu kfe la kinjivir.

Mo wir dzem din ghay sin wun a vitaavi ve vi, wiy a ser ca’ vinyo vee mo nser suuyi, e fi’ a king kiiy wun a ghveme fo ghay wun a vitaavi ve wir amo’o wun a foo runer rengreng mo lii wo jung, nyaang woo wong wun a dze’em ye junge e wong wo wir dzem ker ghay shoo ta’a.
Bo yo’dze a din ghay sin wun a vitaavi vin vi jeey e shaa fo dzee yee mo kintati ke vitum vee kitu ke nsay ki ta’a.
Ki nyo ki yo’dze sho e sa’ fen ke dze kitum, kintati kin wir wu biner ji ki fo wun vitaavi ji wu waa yii a kinyo ke ki laar a ghay si wun a vitaavi vi ve a sangen e sa’fen.
